Posts.Content: Beatthis60 wrote: I was just diagnosed with bc 2 lumps in right breast together they are about 5 cm.I have been told that the caner center in Stony Point is very good. Saw a surgeon and he seemed unprepared and left me very confused. He did say that a mass was shown on my lungs through the nammagram and told me about a test that needed to be done. I an afraid and confused and I would like to have a caring and patient doctor and hospital . Any suggestions greatly appreciated. Lymph nodes were cancer free and my breast have been hurting since the biopsy. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: Best bc surgeon and hospital in Richmond, Va Beatthis60 dlb823
